ygData.subject: Re: Specialization
ygData.msgSnippet: No, a guide in-game told me that the primary specialization can go to 200 or 250 (he didn t remember which) and that all the others stop at 50. ... From: Alan
ygData.messageBody:
No, a guide in-game told me that the primary specialization can go to 200 or
250 (he didn't remember which) and that all the others stop at 50.


----- Original Message -----
From: Alan Charity <acharity@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, July 30, 1999 10:12 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Specialization


> From: "Alan Charity" <acharity@...>
>
> I just logged on at lunch to kill a few Bandits and noticed that my
> Specialize Evocation went to 103.
> I do know that my Evocation is maxed at 125.
>
> I was under the impression that the Primary specialization would stop at
100
> and the rest at 50. My other Specialized abilities have not reached 50
yet
> so I am interested to see what happens.
>
>
> Anyone else notice this or am I just lucky?
>
>
> Algernon of Karana
> 24th Level Wizard
>
>
> --------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
>
> ONElist: your connection to online communities.
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
>
